law.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:
"Advertising" means the giving of notice by publication pursuant to KRS Chapter 424; and
"Department" means Department of Highways.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 157. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356s-11.
